title: Adidas sale: Take 20% off select loungewear
title_page: Adidas sale: Take 20% off select loungewear - CNN
maintext:
If you're going to be stuck inside, you might as well look good doing it. That seems to be Adidas' philosophy, since the fan-favorite activewear retailer is taking 20% off select loungewear, now through April 6 with promo code ADIWEAR.
Work — and work out — from home in any of the over 2,000 on-sale styles, which include everything from sweatshirts and tees to shorts and sweatpants. You'll find styles in springlike pastels that will brighten your look and your mood, and even some coveted discounted slides, a perfect replacement for too-warm slippers as the weather warms up.
Scroll through all of Adidas' on-sale offerings now, or just check out a few of our favorite comfy, discounted clothes below:
Women's Originals Kimono ($56, originally $70; adidas.com)
Adidas Women's Originals Kimono
This belted, tie-dyed silk kimono is a comfortable yet trendy piece to wear around the house.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Women's Originals Adilette Slides ($36, originally $45; adidas.com)
Adidas Women's Originals Adilette Slides
These lilac slides are ideal for spring and easy to slip on if you need to step outside to check the mail or walk the dog.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Women's Essentials Favorites Knit Pants ($36, originally $45; adidas.com)
Adidas Women's Essentials Favorites Knit Pants
These knit sweatpants are called favorites for a reason. This slim-fit style is made from super soft French terry fabric.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Women's Originals Large Logo Cropped Hoodie ($52, originally $65; adidas.com)
Adidas Women's Originals Large Logo Cropped Hoodie
This cozy cropped hoodie features a metallic logo accent to add some sparkle to your work-from-home look.
Men's Essentials 3-Stripes Pants ($16, originally $40; adidas.com)
Adidas Men's Essentials 3-Stripes Pants
This classic pair of elastic-waist pants is down to just $16.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Men's Originals Trefoil Mid-Cut Crew Socks, 6 pairs ($16, originally $20; adidas.com)
Adidas Men's Originals Trefoil Mid-Cut Crew Socks
Stock up on essential crew socks now that this pack of six is marked down.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Men's Originals Shmoo Terry Shorts ($48, originally $60; adidas.com)
Adidas Men's Originals Shmoo Terry Shorts
These cotton shorts are soft enough — and bright enough — to light up a day spent at home.
_______________________________________________________________________________________________
Men's Originals Crew Sweatshirt ($52, originally $65; adidas.com)
Adidas Men's Originals Crew Sweatshirt
Snuggle up in this French terry sweatshirt featuring drop shoulders and a loose silhouette for ultimate comfort.
For more great Adidas deals, check out CNN Coupons.
Note: The prices above reflect the retailer's listed price at the time of publication.
